verses.roman:
sei 'śuddha-bhakta', ye tomā bhaje tomā lāgi'
āpanāra sukha-duḥkhe haya bhoga-bhogī'

synonyms: sei—he; śuddha-bhakta—a pure devotee; ye—who; tomā bhaje—worships You; tomā lāgi'-for Your satisfaction; āpanāra sukha-duḥkhe—for personal happiness and distress; haya—is; bhoga-bhogī—one who wants to enjoy this material world.
translation: "Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka is a pure devotee who worships You only for Your satisfaction. He does not care about his personal happiness or distress, for that is the business of a materialist.
